imdb.plot outline: South Korean comedy/reality show that has a changing cast of 6 male comedians, actors, and singers. They spend 2 days and 1 night at vacation spots, remote scenic villages, and historic landmarks. Of course there are games and contests with each other and locals to determine who gets to eat local delicacies and who has to sleep outside in a tent.
imdb.title: 2 Days 1 Night
plot: South Korean comedy/reality show that has a changing cast of 6 male comedians, actors, and singers. They spend 2 days and 1 night at vacation spots, remote scenic villages, and historic landmarks. Of course there are games and contests with each other and locals to determine who gets to eat local delicacies and who has to sleep outside in a tent.::Matthew Weaver
